patthana8.62:4.1: Nasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.62:5.1: Naavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.62:6.1: Nasavicārañca naavicārañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.62:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane cha … pe … avigate nava.
